system.description:
Starting at 10th level, you have become a menace to the enemies of your benefactor. You gain an expertise die on attacks made against creatures with an evil or good alignment that opposes your benefactor, and on saving throws made to resist effects from those creatures. Neutral benefactors are opposed by both good and evil.

For example, if your benefactor is lawful good, you would gain this benefit on attacks against any creature with an evil alignment (LE/NE/CE).
